questions.question: The meeting has been ………………………….
questions.description: To put off is to postpone.

questions.question: Julie ………………………… us yesterday.
questions.description: To call on is to visit.

questions.question: It took me quite some time to …………………………. her demise.
questions.description: To get over is to overcome.

questions.question: Although we had little chance of success, we didn’t ………………………… hope.
questions.description: To give up is to stop.

questions.question: She doesn’t ………………………… with her in laws.
questions.description: To get along is to have friendly relationship.

questions.question: He ……………………….. when he was just
questions.description: To pass away is to die.

questions.question: After having put a lot of effort …………………….. this project, I don’t want it to fail.
If that table ………………………… a lot of space, it should be moved to the hall.
questions.description: To take up space is to occupy it.

questions.question: The teacher advised the students to ………………………… their lessons before the exam.
questions.description: To go through the lessons is to revise the lessons.

questions.question: Firemen were called in to ……………………………. the fire.
questions.description: To put out is to extinguish.

questions.question: They are …………………… a new edition of that book.
questions.description: To bring out a book is to publish it.

questions.question: While cleaning the attic, I ………………………. these old photos of mine.
questions.description: To come across is to find by chance.
